Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces The Human Meteor and his initial confrontation with underwater threats and surface attackers, leading to a mission to infiltrate a suspicious yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Pier Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces The Human Meteor and his alter ego Duke, setting up the initial conflict with an ambush at the pier.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Yacht Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Human Meteor dealing with the attackers, receiving a new mission related to a yacht, and preparing to infiltrate it.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Human Meteor's underwater mission to confront the submarine threat, battling enemies and ultimately destroying the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Surface and Yacht Investigation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the surface actions following the submarine attack, including investigation on the yacht and reporting to the authorities.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map
Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends & Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline featuring the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi fiends and a separate mystery involving an ambulance and two boys.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads in combat and simultaneously sets up a mystery with an ambulance arriving at a house observed by two boys.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Clue and Mr. Horst Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the boys discovering a wallet clue related to the ambulance incident, leading them to the bus garage and a dangerous encounter with Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue
Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return
Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

sub_scenes.title: Mr. Horst's Interrogation and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Mr. Horst's interrogation of the boys, the revelation of a violent plan, and Major Bronson's unexpected intervention to save them.

sub_scenes.title: Chaos and Bronson's Turn
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic events following Bronson's intervention, including a fight, the boys' capture, and Bronson's unexpected violent act against Horst's men.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Nazi Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the boys seeking help from Marines, the discovery of sabotage plans, and the subsequent attack on the Marine Barracks by Nazi agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Marines Intervention and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in the Marines' intervention, the resolution of the Nazi threat, and a celebratory aftermath.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Champ and Henry as they get entangled in an intrigue in South America, investigating the kidnapping of Rosita and confronting El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Arrival in South America
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Champ and Henry and their arrival in a South American town, immediately facing suspicion and investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officer Interrogations and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the widespread interrogations by officers, the expulsion of civilians, and the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Capture by El Tigre and Hideout Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Champ and Henry's capture by El Tigre, the planning and execution of the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout to rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion
Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Rescue of Rosita and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the rescue of Rosita, the combat with Axis agents, and the celebratory conclusion of the mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents
Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated
Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, facing native tribes, uncovering betrayals, and confronting sinister agents.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Introduction and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and transitions to a military briefing discussing his actions and motivations.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's arrival in the jungle, his observation by a hidden figure, and the subsequent ambush of another character by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Plan Extraction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the captured soldier being brought before Grauer, suspicion around Dolan, and the brutal torture to extract vital plans.

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Native Liberation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details arson, a marine attack, Grauer's orders, the burning of native huts, and Dolan's confrontation with the natives leading to the chief's death and tribe liberation.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge
Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam
Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Confrontation and Discipline
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the Dolan storyline with a shipboard confrontation, Sam's onslaught, and Dolan administering discipline.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Bank Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of a banker, leading them to uncover racketeering and a community coming together to help.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and their initial news assignment to investigate the banker's murder.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues
Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition

sub_scenes.title: Barnacci Suspicion and Reilly Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the twins suspecting Barnacci, contacting Elijah for information, and pursuing Tom Reilly based on new leads.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat

sub_scenes.title: Street Brawl, Police Intervention, and Medical Emergency
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes a separate street brawl, police intervention, and the focus shifting to a medical emergency with a shooting victim.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Crisis and Community Support
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the hospital setting, the diagnosis of Mrs. Murphy's condition, the blood type mismatch, and the community's overwhelming response to the call for blood donors.

narrative_arcs.title: Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information

sub_scenes.title: Justice for Farnacci and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins storyline with the pursuit of justice against Farnacci, his apprehension by the police, and a celebratory birthday party for Reilly's recovered daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom
Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
